Episode.GuestStars: |Ben Bela Böhm|Don Harvey|Hayley Holmes|Javier Grajeda|Josh Fadem|Lavell Crawford|Maximino Arciniega Jr.|Morgan Krantz|Peter Diseth|Robert Forster|Roland Buck III|Sasha Feldman|Stefan Kapičić|
Episode.Overview: Now doing business as Saul Goodman, Jimmy unveils an unorthodox strategy for client development that tests Kim's tolerance of his new legal persona. Lalo searches for the mysterious Michael, only to discover a problem within his own operation.
